survey_name: Professional Development and Training Needs Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employees' professional development needs and preferences to tailor training programs effectively.

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in professional development or training programs?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to simplify responses.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in professional development or training programs?

questions.question_text: Which of the following professional development topics are you most interested in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow multiple selections.

script.question_text: Which of the following professional development topics are you most interested in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is your preferred format for professional development sessions?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format with an 'Other' option for flexibility.

script.question_text: What is your preferred format for professional development sessions?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current professional development opportunities provided by your organization?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current professional development opportunities provided by your organization?

questions.question_text: What barriers do you face in participating in professional development programs? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to identify common barriers.

script.question_text: What barriers do you face in participating in professional development programs? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your organization's professional development programs to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure likelihood of recommendation.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your organization's professional development programs to a colleague?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the professional development programs offered by your organization?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended format to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the professional development programs offered by your organization?

questions.question_text: Do you feel that the professional development programs align with your career goals?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure alignment with career goals.

script.question_text: Do you feel that the professional development programs align with your career goals?

questions.question_text: How do you prefer to receive notifications about upcoming professional development opportunities? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to identify preferred communication channels.

script.question_text: How do you prefer to receive notifications about upcoming professional development opportunities? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in mentorship programs as part of your professional development?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to gauge interest in mentorship.

script.question_text: Would you be interested in mentorship programs as part of your professional development?
